event.description: Dustin Pedroia lines out to center fielder Adam Eaton.
Dropped foul pop error by catcher Matt Wieters.
Andrew Benintendi walks.
Mookie Betts strikes out swinging and Andrew Benintendi caught stealing 2nd, catcher Matt Wieters to second baseman Daniel Murphy.
Hanley Ramirez singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Adam Eaton.
Pablo Sandoval doubles (7) on a line drive to right fielder Bryce Harper. Hanley Ramirez to 3rd.
Xander Bogaerts lines out to shortstop Trea Turner.
Jackie Bradley grounds out, second baseman Daniel Murphy to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman. Hanley Ramirez scores. Pablo Sandoval to 3rd.
Christian Vazquez singles on a fly ball to left fielder Jayson Werth. Pablo Sandoval scores.
Brock Holt grounds out sharply to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Dustin Pedroia pops out to catcher Matt Wieters in foul territory.
Andrew Benintendi doubles (7) on a line drive to right fielder Bryce Harper.
Mookie Betts grounds out, shortstop Trea Turner to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Hanley Ramirez strikes out swinging.
Pablo Sandoval flies out to left fielder Jayson Werth.
Xander Bogaerts strikes out swinging.
Jackie Bradley grounds out to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Christian Vazquez singles on a line drive to right fielder Bryce Harper.
Brock Holt strikes out swinging.
Mike Miller flies out to center fielder Adam Eaton.
Andrew Benintendi singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Bryce Harper. Christian Vazquez to 3rd.
Mookie Betts flies out to center fielder Adam Eaton.
Pitching Change: Gio Gonzalez replaces Max Scherzer, batting 5th, replacing left fielder Jayson Werth.
Defensive Substitution: Rafael Bautista replaces first baseman Ryan Zimmerman, batting 4th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Adam Lind replaces right fielder Bryce Harper, batting 3rd, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Chris Heisey replaces shortstop Trea Turner, batting 1st, playing left field.
Michael Taylor remains in the game as the center fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Jose Lobaton replaces catcher Matt Wieters, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: Brandon Snyder replaces third baseman Grant Green, batting 8th, playing third base.
Wilmer Difo remains in the game as the shortstop.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chris Young replaces Hanley Ramirez.
Chris Young pops out to second baseman Daniel Murphy.
Pablo Sandoval flies out to right fielder Rafael Bautista.
Xander Bogaerts singles on a ground ball to right fielder Rafael Bautista.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Deiner Lopez replaces Xander Bogaerts.
Jackie Bradley singles on a line drive to center fielder Michael Taylor. Deiner Lopez to 3rd.
Sandy Leon flies out to right fielder Rafael Bautista.
Bryan Mejia remains in the game as the second baseman.
Cole Sturgeon strikes out swinging.
Mike Miller grounds out, shortstop Wilmer Difo to first baseman Adam Lind.
Pitching Change: Joe Blanton replaces Gio Gonzalez, batting 5th.
Matt Dominguez singles on a line drive to center fielder Michael Taylor.
Joseph Monge singles on a line drive to center fielder Michael Taylor. Matt Dominguez to 2nd.
Chris Young strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Shawn Kelley replaces Joe Blanton, batting 5th, replacing Rhett Wiseman.
Tzu-Wei Lin walks.
Pitching Change: Enny Romero replaces Shawn Kelley, batting 5th.
Deiner Lopez walks. Tzu-Wei Lin to 2nd.
Tate Matheny strikes out swinging.

Sandy Leon grounds into a force out, third baseman Brandon Snyder to second baseman Bryan Mejia. Tzu-Wei Lin scores. Deiner Lopez out at 2nd. Sandy Leon advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by second baseman Bryan Mejia.
Cole Sturgeon grounds out, third baseman Brandon Snyder to first baseman Adam Lind.
Pitching Change: Blake Treinen replaces Enny Romero, batting 5th.
Mike Miller singles on a ground ball to right fielder Rafael Bautista.
Matt Dominguez walks. Mike Miller to 2nd.
Joseph Monge strikes out swinging.
Chris Young reaches on a force attempt, missed catch error by second baseman Bryan Mejia, assist to third baseman Brandon Snyder. Mike Miller scores. Matt Dominguez to 2nd.
Tzu-Wei Lin walks. Matt Dominguez to 3rd. Chris Young to 2nd.
Deiner Lopez strikes out swinging.
Tate Matheny called out on strikes.
Trea Turner singles on a line drive to right fielder Mookie Betts.
Daniel Murphy grounds out sharply to first baseman Brock Holt. Trea Turner to 2nd.
Bryce Harper walks.
Ryan Zimmerman walks. Trea Turner to 3rd. Bryce Harper to 2nd.
Jayson Werth walks. Trea Turner scores. Bryce Harper to 3rd. Ryan Zimmerman to 2nd.
Adam Eaton out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Andrew Benintendi. Bryce Harper scores.
Matt Wieters strikes out swinging.
Grant Green flies out to right fielder Mookie Betts.
Max Scherzer singles on a ground ball to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
Trea Turner called out on strikes.
Daniel Murphy grounds out to first baseman Brock Holt.
Defensive Substitution: Mike Miller replaces second baseman Dustin Pedroia, batting 1st, playing second base.
Bryce Harper flies out to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
Ryan Zimmerman strikes out swinging.
Jayson Werth called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Craig Kimbrel replaces Eduardo Rodriguez.
Adam Eaton flies out to center fielder Jackie Bradley.
Matt Wieters grounds out, second baseman Mike Miller to first baseman Brock Holt.
Grant Green strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Sandy Leon replaces catcher Christian Vazquez, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Pitching Change: Robbie Ross replaces Craig Kimbrel.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Wilmer Difo replaces Max Scherzer.
Wilmer Difo strikes out swinging, catcher Sandy Leon to first baseman Brock Holt.
Trea Turner singles on a ground ball to first baseman Brock Holt.
Daniel Murphy singles on a ground ball to right fielder Mookie Betts. Trea Turner to 2nd.
Bryce Harper doubles (4) on a line drive to right fielder Mookie Betts. Trea Turner scores. Daniel Murphy to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Austin Maddox replaces Robbie Ross.
Ryan Zimmerman walks.
Jayson Werth pops out to third baseman Pablo Sandoval on the infield fly rule.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Michael Taylor replaces Adam Eaton.
Michael Taylor grounds into a force out, fielded by third baseman Pablo Sandoval. Bryce Harper out at 3rd.
Defensive switch from second base to third base for Mike Miller.
Defensive Substitution: Cole Sturgeon replaces first baseman Brock Holt, batting 9th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Tate Matheny replaces center fielder Jackie Bradley, batting 7th, playing right field.
Chris Young remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Defensive Substitution: Tzu-Wei Lin replaces third baseman Pablo Sandoval, batting 5th, playing second base.
Deiner Lopez remains in the game as the shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Joseph Monge replaces right fielder Mookie Betts, batting 3rd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Matt Dominguez replaces left fielder Andrew Benintendi, batting 2nd, playing first base.
Pitching Change: Joe Kelly replaces Austin Maddox.
Jose Lobaton singles on a fly ball to left fielder Cole Sturgeon.
Brandon Snyder doubles (4) on a line drive to right fielder Tate Matheny. Jose Lobaton to 3rd.
Wilmer Difo grounds out, shortstop Deiner Lopez to first baseman Matt Dominguez. Jose Lobaton scores. Brandon Snyder to 3rd.
Chris Heisey flies out to left fielder Cole Sturgeon.
Pitching Change: Robby Scott replaces Joe Kelly.
Daniel Murphy walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Bryan Mejia replaces Daniel Murphy.
Adam Lind called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Heath Hembree replaces Robby Scott.
Rafael Bautista singles on a ground ball to center fielder Joseph Monge.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Rhett Wiseman replaces Joe Blanton.
With Rhett Wiseman batting, Rafael Bautista steals (2) 2nd base.
Rhett Wiseman strikes out swinging.
Michael Taylor flies out to right fielder Tate Matheny.
With Jose Lobaton batting, wild pitch by Heath Hembree, Rafael Bautista to 3rd.
Jose Lobaton strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Fernando Abad replaces Heath Hembree.
Brandon Snyder flies out to right fielder Tate Matheny.
Wilmer Difo strikes out swinging.
Chris Heisey strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Dan Butler replaces catcher Sandy Leon, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Pitching Change: Jamie Callahan replaces Fernando Abad.
Bryan Mejia grounds out, second baseman Tzu-Wei Lin to first baseman Matt Dominguez.
Adam Lind singles on a line drive to right fielder Tate Matheny.
Rafael Bautista strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jhonatan Solano replaces Blake Treinen.
Jhonatan Solano walks. Adam Lind to 2nd.
Michael Taylor singles on a sharp ground ball to pitcher Jamie Callahan. Adam Lind to 3rd. Jhonatan Solano to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Chandler Shepherd replaces Jamie Callahan.
Jose Lobaton flies out to right fielder Tate Matheny.
